description.p: This package is a technical integration of the wro4j library into Nuxeo. It allows one webengine application to declare its own wro.xml file. The resources will be concatenated into the wro servlet located at http://${nuxeo.host}/nuxeo/wro/mygroup.css

By default, wro4j doesn’t know how to treat @import in .less files. This prevents from using for instance bootstrap.less file which can be painfull. The package declare a new Less processor that is able to treat those @imports for one level of import. It’s now able to compile bootstrap.less.
